tag_list: dan-sodergren, danthemarketingman, guerrilla-marketing, e-marketing, mobile-marketing, business-developer, marketing-expert
overview:
Dan is a determined, driven, ethical, marketing realist.

With over:10 years in marketing successful promotions, 7 years in B2B (5 in B2C). Over 4 years giving business advice to over 3000 businesses and now 3 years in intensive hands on digital marketing.

Dan now specialises in cutting edge mobile and digital marketing including augmented reality and gaming applications.

His company, Great Marketing Works, helps in starting up businesses with several award winning successes, giving small business advice centred around proactive specialist marketing.
As well as business developing through the implementation of online / mobile strategies.

With Great Marketing Works Dan has created bespoke training packages for businesses as well as councils on retail and digital marketing as well as on national campaigns for BIS, s4s, and NACUE.

He know focuses on high tech start up businesses and the marketing they need to become successful.
